roleset.name: whisper loudly so that audience can hear

example.name: Args 0 & 1 only
example.text: `` She 's being attacked by the demon , '' Mrs. Warren stagewhispers as the priest sprinkles holy water over the squirming woman , and the television camera grinds .
example.arg: `` She 's being attacked by the demon , ''
as the priest sprinkles holy water over the squirming woman , and the television camera grinds .

roleset.note: STAGEWHISPER-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire, comparison to whisper.01. (from stagewhisper.01-v)
